Body:
pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternUniform(normalization=10.0, regions=[(0, 1, 0,
    3)])
ci_pre_cti = pattern.simulate_ci_pre_cti(shape=(3, 3))
ci_data_simulate = ci_data.simulate(ci_pre_cti=ci_pre_cti, frame_geometry=
    ci_frame.FrameGeometry.euclid_bottom_left(), ci_pattern=pattern,
    cti_settings=arctic_parallel, cti_params=params_parallel, read_noise=
    1.0, noise_seed=1)
image_no_noise = pattern.ci_pre_cti_from_shape(shape=(3, 3))
assert ci_data_simulate.image - image_no_noise == pytest.approx(np.array([[
    1.62, -0.61, -0.53], [-1.07, 0.87, -2.3], [1.74, -0.76, 0.32]]), 0.01)
